title: Bladnoch Peated Single Cask Whisky Tasting

content.raw:
On Thursday, November 21st, Club Mareva Beirut hosted an unforgettable evening dedicated to whisky enthusiasts, featuring a selection of rare Bladnoch Peated Single Cask whiskies. This highly anticipated event brought together friends, members, and whisky aficionados for a night filled with discovery, flavor, and good company.

 

Showcasing Rare Whiskies

The spotlight of the evening was on three exceptional Bladnoch Peated Single Cask expressions:

â€¢Sherry Hogshead Matured (58.3% ABV) â€“ Limited to just 233 bottles.

â€¢Bourbon Barrel Matured (55.9% ABV) â€“ With only 215 bottles ever produced.

â€¢Rum Cask Matured (54.1% ABV) â€“ A rarity with only 249 bottles available.

 

A Festive Atmosphere

With the club adorned in elegant Christmas decorations, the atmosphere was warm, inviting, and full of seasonal cheer. The soft glow of lights and festive accents created the perfect backdrop for an evening of camaraderie and indulgence, setting the tone for what became one of our most memorable events to date.

 

A Night of Community and Joy

The evening wasnâ€™t just about whisky; it was about the people who make Club Mareva Beirut such a special place. Conversations flowed as easily as the whiskies, and the festive setting added an extra layer of warmth to the night. To top it off, three lucky winners were thrilled to receive bottles of Bladnoch Vinaya, spreading even more holiday joy.

 

From all of us at Club Mareva Beirut, thank you for being part of our story. Cheers to great whiskies, festive vibes, and unforgettable memories! ðŸ¥ƒðŸŽ„
